tasks.name: Motor Learning Task
tasks.description: Participants completed fine motor and gross motor tasks with both hands using an MRI compatible computer mouse. The tasks were designed to be selectively difficult for the left hand, leading to a training effect only in that condition. Fine motor task involved accurate, rapid tracing of randomize trail mazes, with performance scores based on distance and error-rate. Gross motor task involved moving the mouse randomly with no accuracy metrics.
